Introduction

I have professional experience in software development, computer systems engineering and haev participated in various hackathon and coding contests.

About Me

Carlos Quihuis is a Computer Science Junior at Arizona State University specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Data Systems. He has professional experience in software and computer systems engineering, and is seeking internship opportunities for summer 2023 and beyond. He has strong technical skills in programming languages, front-end development, tools, databases, and OS, and professional experience with co-founding a decentralized payment system. He has also completed several relevant projects, such as a chess AI and an app utilizing face recognition.
